channel.title: spip on SpawnZii
channel.description: Recent content in spip on SpawnZii

item.title: How we have pwned Root-Me in 2022
item.description: Introduction With a friend (cc Abyss Watcher) we decided to look for vulnerabilities on the SPIP CMS, Root-Me being based on spip we will be able to report vulnerabilities on the platform. In the first days we managed to find some bugs, XSS, CSRF and RCE. Environment Of course we did not our research directly on root me. So we set up a local spip environment. SPIP version 4.1.2 https://files.
